desc: Established in 1948, and based in Hatton Garden, Holts is a second generation family business and a stalwart of the UK jewellery industry. Housing one of the largest teams of lapidaries in the country, Holts provide responsibly sourced fine gemstones and lapidary services to the trade.

layout.text: WE ARE HERE TO TAKE YOUR GEMSTONE ORDERS.
If you would like to come into our showroom, we invite you to contact us to make an appointment.
